name: (Pixel)Blood Arena
description:
The developer looks at the sprite sheet and picks one - "you will be the hero", he says.

Then he picks the villains.

Then he picks the weapons.

Then he builds an arena. Then he slaps them into the arena and yells "FIGHT!"

Thats how it started.

****

Use your WASD keys to move around. 

Use space bar if you have a bow or a magic staff to launch a projectile.  

The weapon swings around you - time your attack to land a blow on the enemy. 

Survive!

This game is an entry to the Miz Jam 1 and my first game to any jam.
